Frequently used in recipes.

1 Shapes

flake

flake
小薄片
  1. snow flake (雪花)

zest

zest
磨碎的柠檬皮
  1. lemon zest

2 Motions

cut

cut
通用的用刀切的动作, 不指定任何形状.
  1. Be careful not to cut your hand!

chop

chop
切成块.
  1. chopped tomatoes

slice

slice
切成片. Slice 原意就是片, 这里用作动词.
  1. sliced bread

dice

dice
切成丁. Dice 原意是骰子, 这里引申为动词, 可以理解为切成骰子状.
  1. diced pancetta

mince

mince
切成末.
  1. beef mince

grind

grind
磨成粉
  1. coffee grinder (咖啡豆研磨机)
  2. ground pepper
grind
绞肉
  1. meat grinder (绞肉机)
  2. ground beef

crumble

crumble
弄碎, 形容饼干, 蛋糕, 墙等.
  1. biscuit crumbles (碎饼干)

stuff

stuff
填

squeeze

squeeze
挤 d r

compress

compress
压缩
  1. compressed biscuits (压缩饼干)

juice

juice
动词, 榨汁
  1. juice a lemon

press

press
榨
  1. pressed coconut water

chill

chill
冷却
chilled
冷藏的, 冷冻的是 frozen

skim

drain

drain
沥水
  1. drain off the water

encase

encase
包住
  1. (Pasty) encased in light puff pastry.

crimp

crimp
压出褶皱
  1. When making dumplings, it’s important to crimp the edges tightly to prevent the filling from leaking out during cooking.

3 Textures

crust

crust
硬壳.
  1. After baking, the bread developed a golden-brown crust.
  2. pizza crust (披萨边)

crumb

crumb
碎屑, 渣
  1. breadcrumb (面包糠)

coating

coating
厚厚一层
  1. a thick coating of chocolate

4 Smells and Tastes

smell

smell
通用的气味, 中性词

aroma

aroma
食物的香味, 褒义

odour

odour
气味. 书面用语, 通常描述化学, 倾向于贬义

scent

scent
细腻的香气, 褒义. 形容食物时不适合浓烈的味道.

flavour

flavour
味道
flavoured
…味的
  1. vanilla flavoured ice cream

piping hot

piping hot
非常热, 热气腾腾. 来源于中世纪，在那个时期，食品用一种名叫“pipe”的器具加热至很高的温度，出锅时通常伴有“嘶嘶”声响，类似于管道中蒸汽的声音，因此形容为“piping hot”
  1. Be careful, the tea is piping hot and can burn your tongue.
  2. Your wok needs to be piping hot before stir frying.

tangy

tangy
形容词, 描述强烈而令人愉悦的酸味
  1. tangy sweetclems
  2. tangy cheese

milky

milky
形容词, 含奶的

fluffy

fluffy
蓬松的
  1. fluffy cake

succulent

succulent
多汁的

crisp / crispy

crisp / crispy
脆的. crisp 强调食物天然的脆, crispy 强调食物经过煎炸烤等形成的脆
  1. crisp apple
  2. crispy bacon

peppery

peppery
辛辣的, 用于形容胡椒, 芝麻菜, 芥末等.

burnt / burned

burnt / burned
糊的, 烧焦的
  1. The stir-fry got burnt because I forgot to stir it.

spicy

spicy
辣的, 用于形容辣椒

tender

tender
嫩的, 用于形容肉或蔬菜
  1. Tenderstem Broccoli (嫩茎西兰花)

refreshing

refreshing
使人凉爽的;消除疲劳的;提神的
  1. refreshing cold beer

wholesome

wholesome
有益健康的

5 Food

cocoa

cocoa /ˈkəʊkəʊ/
可可

filling / stuffing

filling / stuffing
馅. stuffing 特指塞在肉或蔬菜里的馅.

garnish

garnish
点缀

bran

bran
麸

gluten

gluten
麸质
  1. gluten free (不含麸质)

net

net
净
  1. net weight (净重)

yeast

yeast
酵母

6 Container

carton

carton
盒子, 装牛奶或果汁的

tub

tub
小桶 成黄油冰激凌的

splash

splash
溅

baton

bar

mass

dissipate

odour

desiccate

脱水

molasses

糖浆

syrup

fortify

curl

grain

crinkle

crinkle crisps

punchy

fragrant

firming agent

as

ascorbic acid

维生素C

tocopherol 维生素E

nutty

## molluscs

软体动物

crustaceans

infuse

chunk

scoop

lengthway

tray

film

trim

fiery

tube

raise

raise

发面 ## cap

punnet

quench 解渴

quencher 解渴的饮料 ## slit cut a slit

coarse

can

bottle
